alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 21 at 10:15PM CDT until September 21 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Nebraska, including the following counties, Boyd, Holt, Keya Paha and Rock. * WHEN...Until 115 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1009 PM CDT, Minor flooding from heavy rainfall runoff is likely for the next couple of hours in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... O`Neill, Bassett, Atkinson, Stuart, Newport, Emmet, Dustin, Mariaville, Pony Lake, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Anncar, Midway and Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
